github.feedbackTooltip: Report bugs or suggest features on GitHub

cookie.bannerText: We use cookies to improve your experience. Do you allow us to use your data for Google Analytics and ads?

settings.title: Settings
settings.providersDesc: Enter your API keys. Keys are stored only in your browser, never sent to servers.
settings.mcpDesc: Model Context Protocol server connection status
settings.mcpBuiltinDesc: These servers are automatically attached to agents and cannot be removed.
settings.mcpCustomDesc: Add your own MCP servers and assign them to any agent.
settings.mcpCorsWarning: Your MCP server must allow requests from izan.io (CORS). Add Access-Control-Allow-Origin: https://izan.io to your server's response headers, or the connection will fail.
settings.mcpAssignAgentsDesc: Which agents should have access to this server?
settings.mcpNoCustomServers: No custom MCP servers added yet.
settings.mcpDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this MCP server?

home.heroDescription: izan.io brings OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Groq and more AI providers into a single interface. Smart agents connected to tools via MCP protocol.
home.featurePrivacyDesc: Your API keys are stored only in your browser. Your data is never kept on our servers.
home.featureWebGPUDesc: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Mistral, Groq and 10+ provider support.
home.featureAgentsDesc: Agents connected to tools via MCP protocol, automating tasks.
home.step1Desc: Select a provider like OpenAI, Anthropic, or Google
home.step2Desc: Enter your API key, stored only in your browser
home.step3Desc: Models like GPT-4.1, Claude Sonnet 4, Gemini 2.5
home.step4Desc: Web search, code writing and more via MCP servers
home.providersDesc: 17+ AI providers on one platform. Use your own API key for each provider — keys are stored only in your browser.
home.providersCta: Add providers and configure API keys in settings
home.noApiKeyStorage: We never store your API keys
home.privacyDesc: izan.io is fully open source. Your API keys are stored only in your browser's IndexedDB — never sent to our servers. Your conversations stay local. You can review the source code on GitHub.

chat.startTyping: Type a message to start the conversation
chat.startNewChat: Start a new conversation to chat with this agent.
chat.selectProviderFirst: Select a provider and model first...
chat.selectProviderHint: Select a provider and model from the top right to send messages
chat.systemPrompt: You are a helpful AI assistant. Respond in English. Be kind and informative to the user.
chat.responseError: [Error: Something went wrong while generating the response]

provider.selectDesc: Choose an AI provider and enter your API key. Keys are stored only in your browser.

agents.title: AI Agents
agents.description: Agents integrated with MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers. Each agent provides access to different tools and automates tasks.
agents.createPlain: A blank agent will be created. You can customize it later.
agents.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this agent?
agents.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset this agent to its default settings?
agents.name: Name
agents.basePromptPlaceholder: Prompt defining the agent's base behavior...

general.name: General Assistant
general.description: General purpose AI assistant. Helps with any topic.
general.whatItDoes: Uses basic tools: time, calculation, password generation, UUID. Answers general questions.

web-search.name: Web Search
web-search.description: Searches the web and gathers information.
web-search.whatItDoes: Searches the web via Bing and Google. Finds current info, compares and summarizes.
web-search.usageExample1: What are the differences between ChatGPT and Claude?

domain-expert.name: Domain Expert
domain-expert.description: Domain availability checking and registration insights.
domain-expert.whatItDoes: Checks domain availability, suggests domains by keyword (.com, .io, .net etc.). Uses GoDaddy API.

agents.implicitMCPsDesc: Built-in MCP servers this agent can use
agents.customMCPsDesc: Custom MCP servers assigned to this agent
agents.linkedAgentsDesc: This agent can ask questions to linked agents.
agents.noAvailableMCPs: No MCP servers to add. Add new MCPs from settings.
agents.noAvailableAgents: No other agents available to link.

errors.notConfigured: LLM not configured. Select a provider and model from settings.
